metadata.name: Valentine's Hearts #crazy-love
metadata.description:
Prime Hearts Planet was born from the dream of not only wanting to share infinite love with the world, but to become the love we dreamt.

In honor of Valentine’s Day, internationally acclaimed visual artist ROBERRA will use the Prime Hearts Planet platform to celebrate love and bring his extraordinary collection to life.

This Special Valentine’s Day NFT Collection, consisting of 4 sets of unique NFT hearts, is the celebration of love. The Crazy Love, Exclusive Love, Legendary Love, and Rare Love Collections were carefully crafted in hopes of awakening intense sensations of love and building a global community of lovers.
